EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Invitation email for reviewers for registering into GovGrants
EmailTemplate.name: Invite Reviewers
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to register in Enterprise Grants Management System (EGMS)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Congratulations on being selected as a SME (subject matter expert) Reviewer for EGMS applications. Please click on the below URL to register and create your login account.
You will be required to provide your contact details and area(s) of expertise in order to create the profile in the system. You will also be prompted to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement and Conflict of Interest Agreement. Click here.
Please do not reply to this system generated email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
